effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 176,877 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 10,364. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 68,434 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,024 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the cause of Ironforge.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
